definitions.definition: The quality produced by the sensation of taste or, especially, of taste and smell in combined effect .
examples: The flavor of this apple pie is delicious.

definitions.definition: Flavoring , a substance used to produce a taste.
examples: Flavor was added to the pudding.

definitions.definition: A variety (of taste) attributed to an object (food, candy, chewing gum, medicine, etc).
examples: What flavor of bubble gum do you most enjoy?
My favorite flavor of lip balm is called mystical minty camomile.
Debian is one flavor of the Linux operating system.

definitions.definition: One of the six types of quarks ( top , bottom , strange , charmed , up , and down ) or three types of leptons ( electron , muon , and tauon ).
The quality produced by the sensation of smell ; odour ; fragrance .

main_definition: The quality produced by the sensation of taste or, especially, of taste and smell in combined effect .
secondary_definitions: Flavoring , a substance used to produce a taste.
A variety (of taste) attributed to an object (food, candy, chewing gum, medicine, etc).
( informal , figurative ) A kind or type.
( particle physics ) One of the six types of quarks ( top , bottom , strange , charmed , up , and down ) or three types of leptons ( electron , muon , and tauon ).
( archaic ) The quality produced by the sensation of smell ; odour ; fragrance .
